response.job_title: Civil Engineer. C1 English Speaker. Workforce Analyst for Contact Center BPO. General knowledge and experience on Building Information Modeling (BIM). Excel and VBA proficient.
response.summary:
Civil Engineer. Data and Reporting Analyst. High proficiency on Data and Reporting using Power BI, SQL Server, Excel and VBA. Mathematic/statistic knowledge. General knowledge of Building Information Modeling (BIM) and drafting (CAD) for architecture, land surveying and design of and calculation of Hydraulic and Sanitary Systems. C1 English Speaker.

Hard Skills
•	Advanced knowledge on Power BI, Microsoft Excel and Office, Visual Basic Macros, DAX, Power Query and M Syntax, Office, AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Revit.
•	Intermediate knowledge on T-SQL Server, Python, Pandas and Matplotlib for Data Analysis, Dynamo scripts for Revit.
•	High Mathematical, Logic and Statistics Skills.
Soft Skills
•	Analytical thinking.
•	Team Player.
•	Assertive communication.
•	Detail Oriented.
response.skills: Reporting & Analysis, Dashboard, Pivot Tables, Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Microsoft Office, ArcMap, Autodesk Civil 3D, Microsoft Excel, Visual Basic, SQL, Customer Service, English, Ingeniería civil, AutoCAD, Revit, Modelado, Gestión de obras de construcción, Revit MEP, Revit Architecture

company.name: Caravela Coffee
company.description:
Caravela is a Latin American green coffee exporter and importer, responsibly sourcing coffee from almost 4,000 smallholder farmers and coffee producers across eight countries in Latin America.

Almost 90% of the Caravela team is based at origin, most of them agronomists or cuppers providing training, technical support and quality feedback to producers in Colombia, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Mexico, Nicaragua, and Peru. Alongside our import offices in Australia, Europe, North America, and Taiwan, Caravela is dedicated to bridging the gap between specialty coffee roasters and smallholder coffee farmers, focused on quality, transparency and long-term sustainable relationships.

Caravela has been a B-Corp certified company since 2014 and has been named by B-Labs a Best-for-the-World company the last six years.

We operate almost 40 cupping labs, often in remote locations, where highly trained quality analysts identify and purchase individual deliveries direct from producers at above average market premiums and where exceptional quality is incentivised with constant technical assistance and experimentation.

Quality is the Cornerstone: We believe in keeping outstanding coffees separate, to recognize the farmers who go the extra mile to produce amazing coffee.  Every year our QC Analysts cup over 20,000 samples from more than 4,000 individual coffee producers and cooperatives, providing individual feedback to every single farmer.
